title: .NET Software Engineer
description:
About This Opportunity
We are looking for a highly skilled Software Engineer to join our team. This person will primarily be utilizing .NET Core, C#, SQL. We hire innovative software development professionals who can work well within a highly collaborative, agile team to develop high quality, testable software. The ideal developer for this position will have a wide breadth of experience performing development in a .NET environment and developing integrations to third-party systems.
English Language skills are required.
This position is CLT and fully remote in Brazil.
Benefits include health and dental insurance, meal and restaurant vouchers, fixed monthly stipend for internet and mobile expenses, InComm hardware/software, and annual bonuses!
Responsibilities
Developing SaaS applications, including .NET APIs, ASP.NET MVC applications, and React applications
Working with our product organization to understand business requirements and objectives
Contributing to overall system architecture strategy and design
Leading by example and setting a high standard for code quality
Performing code and design reviews
Motivating an agile team and fostering collaboration and innovation across our development organization
Qualifications
Minimum 5 years full-stack experience working through design, implementation, testing, and delivering high availability enterprise applications
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field, or 4-6 years of related experience
Should have a record of successful delivery of software applications as an individual and with a team
Strong understanding of the Agile software development methodologies and principles
Experience with CI/CD
Must have strong experience and exhibit in-depth knowledge of .NET Core, C#, SQL, MVC, SOA, Web API, Microservices, JavaScript, Typescript, HTML
Frontend experience is a plus (Angular, React)
Understanding of cloud native applications (Azure, AWS)
English Language skills are required.
InComm provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or national origin, citizenship, veteran’s status, age, disability status, genetics or any other category protected by federal, state, or local law.

title: Outbound B2B Cold Caller (Remote)
description:
Job Title
Outbound B2B Cold Caller (Remote)
About the Role
We’re hiring a full-time
B2B outbound cold caller
who will focus solely on
qualifying and live-transferring business owners
to our Account Executives.
This is not a warm lead role. You’ll be calling prospects who don’t know us—so confidence, tonality, and outbound cold calling experience are essential.
What You'll Do
Make
500–900 outbound calls per day
Maintain
250+ minutes of talk time daily
Achieve
at least 1 qualified live transfer per day
Be on calls for
at least 8 hours of your 9-hour shift
(more if KPIs are not met)
Work in full coordination with a team of closers
Use provided scripts and tools as guided
Follow up via SMS when needed
Working Hours
Monday to Friday
9:00 AM to 6:00 PM EST
(including 1-hour break)
Fully remote
Compensation & Incentives
$600/month base salary
Daily commission structure:
1 qualified lead:
$20
2 qualified leads:
$30
3 qualified leads:
$40
$100 bonus per closed deal
from your transferred leads
Paid weekly via Deel
Additional Benefits
Paid Time Off (PTO)
2-week paid training
1.5-month probation
before permanent hire
Growth opportunities
within a fast-growing company
Supportive environment
with hands-on guidance from day one
Requirements
Proven experience in
B2B outbound cold calling
Excellent
phone presence and tonality
High level of
spoken English
Must be a
team player
and willing to collaborate
Reliable
internet connection, headset, and computer
(equipment not provided)
Ability to
hit targets consistently and take ownership
of performance.
This Role Is For You If...
You’ve done cold calling before and enjoy it
You’re comfortable speaking with U.S. business owners
You want to focus on one thing:
dial, qualify, transfer

title: Consultor de Vendas - Exportação
description:
DETALHES DA VAGA :
Prospecção de clientes em mercados internacionais;
Negociação de contratos e vendas;
Desenvolvimento de estratégias de exportação;
Participação em feiras e eventos internacionais;
Gestão de carteira de clientes;
Análise de mercado e concorrência;
Elaboração de relatórios de vendas e CRM.
REQUISITOS:
Formação superior em áreas como Agronomia, Engenharia Agrícola, Administração ou Comércio Exterior;
Experiência comprovada em vendas internacionais de máquinas agrícolas;
Conhecimento técnico sobre máquinas agrícolas e seus componentes;
Idioma: inglês e espanhol (outros idiomas podem ser um diferencial);
Habilidade de comunicação e negociação;
Disponibilidade para viagens internacionais;
Conhecimento em legislação de comércio exterior.

title: Oracle SCM/OPM Consultant
description:
Job Title:
Oracle SCM/OPM Consultant (Remote – PJ or Cooperativa)
Contract Duration:
1–2 years
Location:
Remote
Language Requirement:
Fluent English
Engagement Type:
PJ or Cooperativa
About the Role
We’re looking for a skilled
Oracle SCM/OPM Consultant
to support our client's Supply Chain operations and help deliver tailored solutions using Oracle EBS R12. This is a fully remote position with long-term potential, ideal for someone with both technical and functional experience in Oracle Supply Chain modules.
Key Responsibilities
Implement and support Oracle Process Manufacturing (OPM) and SCM modules such as Order Management, Shipping, Inventory, Procurement, and WMS.
Provide functional guidance by aligning product features with customer business needs.
Offer strategic recommendations and best practices during implementations.
Analyze and debug technical issues using SQL, PL/SQL, Reports, etc.
Collaborate with clients to resolve critical issues, set expectations, and ensure high satisfaction.
Continuously improve internal processes and tools for better service delivery.
Document system architecture, configurations, and support procedures.
Must-Have Qualifications
2+ years of
techno-functional experience
with Oracle Supply Chain modules.
Minimum of 2 years in
client-facing leadership roles .
Strong knowledge of supply chain processes and Oracle EBS R12.
Proficiency in SQL, PL/SQL, Oracle Forms, Reports, XML/BI Publisher, and Workflow.
Excellent problem-solving and customer service skills.
Flexibility to work in shifts.
Team-oriented with a strong desire to learn and grow.
Nice to Have
Experience with Demantra, ASCP, and Oracle Transportation Management (OTM).

title: React Frontend Developer (Brazil)
description:
React Frontend Software Engineer
BeyondRisk AI-6
Brazil (Remote)
React Frontend Software Engineer
Join BeyondRisk AI-6 and craft the user experience that brings the power of enterprise AI to life! We're seeking a creative and skilled Frontend Software Engineer to design and build intuitive, high-performance user interfaces for our AI-6 platform. Your work will directly shape how users interact with complex AI capabilities, making sophisticated automation accessible and easy to use for global organizations.
About the Role
We’re looking for a React Frontend Software Engineer passionate about building exceptional web applications with modern technologies. You'll be responsible for designing, developing, testing, and iterating on the user-facing components of the BeyondRisk AI-6 platform. Working primarily with
React, TypeScript, JavaScript (ES6+), MUI, and Styled Components , you'll translate complex requirements and AI workflows into intuitive, visually appealing, and highly functional user interfaces. You’ll manage application state effectively using
Redux or Context API , integrate seamlessly with backend
RESTful APIs , and prioritize
performance optimization (e.g., lazy loading)
and
web accessibility . You'll collaborate closely with UI/UX designers, backend engineers, product managers, and AI teams to deliver a seamless and engaging user experience.
This role is fully remote, based in Brazil. We embrace a flexible remote work environment.
React Frontend Software Engineer
Location:
Remote, Brazil
About BeyondRisk AI-6
BeyondRisk empowers organizations to rapidly design, build, and scale AI-driven solutions through our AI-6 platform. We seamlessly bring together smart agents, data, and automation so enterprises can solve their toughest challenges at speed. Backed by leading Silicon Valley investors - we’re expanding our core engineering team. If you’re passionate about building intuitive interfaces for cutting-edge AI, join us.
Key Responsibilities
Develop & Maintain UIs:
Build, test, and maintain responsive, high-quality user interfaces using React, TypeScript, and modern JavaScript (ES6+).
Component Implementation:
Utilize component libraries like MUI and implement custom components with Styled Components, ensuring visual consistency and reusability.
State Management:
Manage complex application state effectively using Redux (with middleware like Thunk) or React's Context API.
API Integration:
Consume backend RESTful APIs efficiently and manage data flow within the frontend application.
Performance Optimization:
Implement techniques like lazy loading, code splitting, and efficient rendering strategies to ensure optimal application performance.
Accessibility:
Build interfaces adhering to web accessibility standards (WCAG) to ensure usability for all users.
Cross-functional Collaboration:
Work closely with UI/UX designers to implement pixel-perfect designs and collaborate with backend engineers and product managers to deliver features.
Code Quality & Testing:
Write clean, maintainable, well-documented, and tested code (experience with Jest/React Testing Library is a plus).
Browser Compatibility:
Ensure consistent performance and appearance across major web browsers.
You’ll Excel in This Role If You:
Have
Proven Frontend Experience:
Several years building complex, interactive web applications in production environments, particularly with React.
Are
Proficient in React & TypeScript:
Possess a deep understanding of React (including Hooks, Context API) and strong proficiency in TypeScript.
Have a
Passion for UI/UX:
Care deeply about creating intuitive, user-friendly, and visually appealing interfaces.
Master Modern Frontend Tooling:
Are comfortable with JavaScript (ES6+), CSS-in-JS (Styled Components), package managers (npm/yarn), and build tools.
Have
Strong API Integration Skills:
Are experienced in consuming RESTful APIs and managing asynchronous operations.
Are a
Collaborative Team Player:
Communicate effectively and enjoy working closely with designers, backend developers, and product teams.
Focus on Quality & Performance:
Advocate for best practices in code quality, testing, performance optimization, and accessibility.
Are
Eager to Learn:
Stay updated with the rapidly evolving frontend ecosystem.
Preferred Qualifications
Demonstrable track record
of building complex, interactive user interfaces for web applications.
Strong proficiency in
JavaScript (ES6+) ,
TypeScript , and
React (Hooks, Context API) .
Experience with component libraries ( MUI preferred ) and CSS-in-JS ( Styled Components preferred ).
Solid understanding and practical experience with state management libraries/patterns ( Redux/Thunk or Context API ).
Proven experience
integrating with RESTful APIs .
Good understanding of
frontend performance optimization techniques (lazy loading, code splitting, memoization) .
Familiarity with
web accessibility standards (WCAG) .
Experience with frontend testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, React Testing Library) is a significant plus.
Familiarity with modern frontend build tools (e.g., Webpack, Vite) is beneficial.
Proficiency with version control using Git.
Why Join BeyondRisk
Compensation & Equity:
Competitive salary + stock options.
High-Impact Role:
Directly shape the user experience of a cutting-edge AI platform used by global enterprises.
Cutting-Edge AI Platform:
Work on the frontend interfaces for a next-gen hyper-automation solution transforming enterprises.
Culture & Learning:
A culture of continuous learning, technical excellence, and close collaboration between engineering and AI/ML teams.
Global Collaboration:
Thrive in a dynamic, international environment, working closely with talented colleagues across the US, Europe, and Asia.
Fast-Paced Growth:
Collaborate with a passionate team and a hands-on leadership group, backed by top Silicon Valley investors.
Long-Term Opportunity:
Shape the future of AI – be at the forefront of enterprise innovation by building the technology that enables it.
Ready to Build the Future of AI Interfaces?
If you’re excited to build intuitive, high-performance user interfaces that bring sophisticated AI capabilities to users, we want to hear from you.
Apply now with an up-to-date CV (PDF). Come shape the next era of enterprise AI at BeyondRisk.

title: Motorista Parceiro (Categoria Utilitários e Carros)
description:
Oportunidade para Motoristas Parceiros (Utilitários,VUC, Carro de
Passeio)
A SUPPLY SOLUÇÕES está
agregando VEÍCULOS UTILITÁRIOS E/OU DE PASSEIO para atuar com entrega em
diversas rotas na região de TAQUARA/ BARRA DA TIJUCA/ RECREIO DOS BANDEIRANTES/
JACAREPAGUÁ/ ZONA SUL DO RIO em uma das maiores empresas do e-commerce do
mundo.
Motoristas experientes
ou pessoas habilitadas que querem iniciar nessa atividade são bem-vindos. Se
você ainda não trabalhou com logística e entregas, não se preocupe, a SUPPLY
dará as orientações, treinamento e suporte para que você possa ingressar
conosco.
Cada motorista utiliza
o seu próprio veículo. Aceitamos:
Modelos de Veículo
Utilitário: Fiorino, Van, HR, Strada, Montana, Saveiro, Kangoo ou SIMILARES.
Veículos de Passeio
todos os modelos
SOBRE A SUPPLY SOLUÇÕES INTEGRADAS LTDA.
Fundada em 2021, e com
atuação no mercado de transporte e logística, a Supply Soluções é uma empresa
referência no setor de logística, atendendo no Rio de Janeiro, nas regiões TAQUARA/
BARRA DA TIJUCA/ RECREIO DOS BANDEIRANTES/ JACAREPAGUÁ/ ZONA SUL DO RIO. Nossa
carteira de clientes inclui grandes nomes como Amazon Logistica, demonstrando
nossa capacidade de oferecer serviços de alta qualidade e confiabilidade.
Na Supply Soluções
Integradas, a segurança de nossos motoristas é uma prioridade. Seguimos
protocolos de segurança e oferecemos treinamentos regulares para garantir que
todos os nossos agregados estejam preparados para atuar confiança e
profissionalismo.
Nossa missão é
proporcionar uma experiência excepcional aos nossos clientes, garantindo
entregas pontuais e eficientes, e buscamos motoristas autônomos para se juntar
à nossa equipe. Venha fazer parte da nossa história de sucesso!
NOSSA OPERAÇÃO
Carregamento agendado e rápido, sem fila de espera
Sem Manuseio de Nota Fiscal
Roteirzação e registo de entregas simplificada pelo Aplicativo
Próprio
Pagamento quinzenal
Incentivos extras por produtividade.
REQUISITOS
Veículo até 15 anos de uso
CNPJ (pode ser MEI)
CNH com registro de "exerce atividade remunerada" (EAR)
Desejável Registro em Transportador Autônomo de Carga (TAC)
Exame Toxicológico (após aprovação do cadastro)
Caso necessário,
daremos as orientações de como obter o MEI, EAR e TAC.
DOCUMENTAÇÃO
Foto 3x4 (fundo branco e focando o rosto)
RG - Frente e verso
CRLV do veículo em PDF
Comprovante de endereço atualizado
Pontuação da CNH (no site de Detran)
Fotos do veículo
VALORES DAS ROTAS (Opcional)
Seg. à Sab: R$320,00 (Utilitário) ; R$ 515,00 (Vans) ; R$ 222,00
(Carro de Passeio)
Dom. e Feriados R$480,00 (Utilitário) ; R$ 772,50 (Vans) ; R$ 270,00
(Carro de Passeio)
Caso o DSP prefira,
pode editar para a informação mais vantajosa, de acordo com o costume da asua
região.
Venha fazer parte da
nossa rede de motoristas parceiros, aumente sua renda e independência
entregando com eficiência e segurança.
Salário mínimo: 222 BRL
Salário máximo: 772.5 BRL
Unidade de salário: Por dia

title: Oportunidade para Motoristas Parceiros (Utilitários) - Carregamento Taquara
description:
Seja um Agregado Logus Logistica Integrada!
A Logus Logistica Integrada, com 2 anos de destaque no
mercado de transporte e logística, busca motoristas autônomos para integrar
nossa equipe em Rio de Janeiro e Petrópolis. Venha fazer parte de uma empresa
referência no setor!
Por que ser um Agregado Logus?
·
Segurança em Primeiro Lugar: Nossa prioridade é

Carregamento agendado e rápido, sem fila.
·
Simplicidade sem manuseio de Nota Fiscal.
·
Roteirização fácil pelo nosso aplicativo.
·
Pagamento quinzenal e incentivos extras por
produtividade.

Veículo com até 15 anos de uso.
·
CNPJ (pode ser MEI).
·
CNH com "exerce atividade remunerada"
(EAR).
·
Exame toxicológico (após aprovação).

·
Foto 3x4 (fundo branco).

RG (frente e verso).
·
CRLV em PDF.
·
Comprovante de endereço atualizado.
·
Pontuação da CNH.
·
Fotos do veículo.
VALORES DAS ROTAS
·
Seg. à Sab: R$320,00 (Utilitário)
·
Dom. e Feriados R$480,00 (Utilitário)
·
Variável de 0,45, por KM planejado em rota
Entre em contato e faça parte da nossa história de sucesso,
garantindo entregas com pontualidade e eficiência!

title: Senior Murex FO - Strong Murex experience is must!
description:
Project Description
DXC Luxoft has one of the world's leading Murex practices. We are a top-tier Murex Alliance Partner and a market leader in implementation, integration, upgrade, and migration. We provide end-to-end project services and have delivered over 200 successful Murex projects across all major asset classes and sectors including investment banking, asset management, corporate treasury, and insurance.
Whether you possess a background in finance, technology, or Mathematics, your experience in the capital markets industry would be of high interest to us.
Responsibilities

  • Part of an embedment team, candidates will learn Murex application while performing the following responsibilities:
  • Resolve daily FO issues on both functional, valuation, and pricing
  • Validate pricing and valuation of financial products being implemented on Finastra Fusion Invest (including sensitivities and VaR)
  • Liaise with the technical team(s) -- when needed -- to resolve FO related issues and necessary enhancements
  • Develop FO Business requirements per given stream and according to Project needs as they come along
  • Yield Curve management and validation; curve assignments; new curve creation
  • Products (IRD, CRD, EQD) management and validation
  • Manage day-to-day assigned project tasks to complete various FO deliverables
  • Contribute and assist existing support group(s) in resolving requests or issues with P&L, Market Data, and booking issues
  • Analyze, formulate, propose, develop and/or contribute to overall solutions as per project deliverables
  • Continuous follow-up of new Market regulations/practices globally
  • Perform various levels of testing for assigned deliverables as well as participate in formal release cycles (SIT/UAT)
    Skills Description
  • Very Strong product knowledge in IRD, EQD, CRD
  • Equity derivatives knowledge. Few key instruments: Portfolio Swaps, Bond Swaps (knowledge will be a huge plus!)

-Product implementation experience

  • Very Strong understanding of the P&L concept overall and its components
  • Very Strong understanding and hands-on experience in Market Data, Curve structure, Simulations, and Trade Life Cycle
  • Strong analytical, pricing, and conceptual skills
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
  • Strong presentation skills
  • Strong relationship building skills both internally and externally
  • Strong experience in supporting FO users and resolving their daily issues
    Must:
  • 5+ years experience on Murex with FO functionalities/module
  • experience in financial markets
  • Must have a strong personality, logical and analytical skills
  • Be detailed-oriented, a quick learner, and a self-starter
  • Possess good verbal and written communication skills
  • Must have strong organization skills

title: Sr. Backend Engineer
description:
MANUAL is a fast growing Healthtech scale-up, aiming to be the healthcare provider that millions of people trust as their partner to a long and healthy life. Our platform allows users to quickly and safely diagnose possible conditions, get treatment and support them afterwards to live a higher quality life. To do this we are building an all in one healthcare platform which brings together world leading medical expertise and technical excellence.
We are looking for a Senior Backend Engineer to contribute to our mission of improving patients' health and their lives.
To us, it’s more than just strong technical fundamentals. We're looking for someone who brings deep engineering skills
and
a strong sense of product ownership.
This is a
remote
role based in
Brazil
— you'll be part of a globally distributed mission-led team with engineering hubs in London, Sofia, and São Paulo.
Who you are
You’re a software engineer with at least 5 years commercial experience
You have a genuine enthusiasm for software engineering and take no greater pleasure than finding the right solution to the problem at hand and making practical tradeoffs
You are excited about contributing to a product that can drive positive change to the lives of millions of people around the world
You have strong ownership mindset - “ you build it, you run it ”
You’re eager to continuously learn, grow and step out of your comfort zone
The idea of working in a successful, high growth startup in a fast paced role excites you
What you will do
Develop scalable & reliable systems
Develop core functionality for our own customer facing and internal products, systems and data platforms, and e-commerce capabilities using modern frameworks
Develop extensible platforms and architectures that make it possible to quickly and efficiently launch new products and lines of business
Develop and maintain integrations with third party systems
Develop the APIs powering the web & mobile platforms for our product portfolio
Drive impact in a team environment
You’ll work with other software engineers, designers, QAs, product managers, business stakeholders and domain experts
You’ll drive impact and own your work end2end - from scoping & planning, architectural design decisions, implementation and testing, to production deployment and operations.
What we need from you
Excellent English skills (verbal and written) are mandatory
At least 5 years of commercial experience as a software engineer or equivalent
Familiarity with scalable cloud architectures, design patterns and best practices
Practical experience with CI/CD and IaC (Infrastructure-as-code)
Readiness to quickly learn PHP (our main BE language for the moment)
Experience with databases & data management practices - relational databases & search engines
Experience with TDD and testable code - unit / integration / performance testing
Great verbal and written communication skills and the ability to explain complex ideas in a simple way to non-engineering teammates
Ability to zoom in and out - be comfortable with getting into the relevant low-level details while also making the optimal tradeoffs for achieving the “big picture” goals
Experience you may have
A degree in CS or equivalent is a plus
Practical experience with building scalable & highly reliable cloud systems that support product used by millions of users around the world 24/7
Familiarity with modern JS frameworks
Experience working in cross functional teams
An eye for user behaviour and design and attention to detail
What we offer
Generous stock option plan
Private medical insurance
Gym & wellness benefit with Wellhub
Remote, hybrid, and flexible work; with office options in São Paulo and Rio de Janeiro
English classes benefit with Cambly
30 days holidays and parental leave, with flexible working policies
International exposure with direct interactions with the UK/EU team
Annual company retreat
A fun and friendly working environment with sharp and motivated co-workers
Join in the early stages of one of the most promising scale-ups in the health & wellness space
Our hiring process
Interviews will be conducted in English
Team fit interview: you'll meet with product & tech leaders
Case study: a take home tech task to assess your software engineering skills
Tech interview: you'll meet with tech team and discuss your case study solution
2 Interviews with members of the executive team
Offer

title: Cyber Security Senior Analyst - CSIRT
description:
Come Make an Impact on Millions of Brazilians!
At RecargaPay, we’re on a mission to deliver the best payment experience for Brazilian consumers and small businesses — by building a powerful digital ecosystem where the banked and unbanked connect, and where consumers and merchants have a one-stop shop for all their financial needs.
We serve over 10 million users and process more than USD 4 billion annually. We’ve been profitable since 2022 and operate our own credit business. We are an AI-first, 100% remote team, scaling in the rapidly changing Brazilian financial market.
Our goal? Deliver the best payment experience in Brazil for people and small businesses alike.
We value autonomy, ownership, and a bias for action. We’re looking for people who are curious, hands-on, and driven by impact — who want to solve real problems, work with strong teams, and rethink what’s possible.
If you’re ready to do your best work, at scale, with purpose — this is your place.

ompetitive and market-aligned salary.R
emote work — wherever you are, you’re part of the team!H
ome office allowance through a monthly deposit in the RecargaPay app.H

ife insurance.F
lexible meal allowance (via Flash).T
otalPass membership to take care of your health.S

iversity & Inclusion at RecargaPayA
t RecargaPay, you’ll have the freedom to be who you are because we believe that diverse perspectives and experiences make us more creative and stronger. y sharing your resume with us, you authorize the use of your data for analysis during the selection process and possibly for other opportunities within the RecargaPay group. title: Design Specialist (IA)
description:
Código da oportunidade: 48304
Há 31 anos no mercado, a BRQ Digital Solutions se consolidou como uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país. Com uma plataforma de serviços end to end, oferecemos as mais eficientes e inovadoras soluções, tecnologias e metodologias, promovendo uma jornada de transformação para grandes marcas, de diferentes segmentos, no Brasil e no exterior.
Temos 2.500 funcionários e a empresa é destaque como um dos melhores lugares para trabalhar pelo GPTW e Glassdoor.
BRQ WAY
No nosso BRQ WAY temos a missão de conectar, transformar e empoderar cada um dos nossos profissionais, que por aqui são chamados de feras, para que todos tenham a chance de usar sua paixão para transformar o mundo com tecnologia!
É isso que queremos, com nosso Programa de Diversidade e Inclusão trabalhamos com dois objetivos: equidade e inclusão, buscamos aumentar a participação dos grupos minoritários, quebrar os vieses inconscientes e expandir a conscientização sobre temas tão importantes para que todos sejam livres para serem quem são.
Vamos transformar juntos! Vem ser fera com a gente.
- O que procuramos?
Designer UX/UI Sênior – Especialista em Design System. Para esta oportunidade é imprescindível conhecimento avançando com IA.
-
O que temos pra te oferecer?
Mais do que um plano de carreira!
A BRQ acredita que cada fera deve ser protagonista do seu crescimento, tendo autonomia para criar seu próprio plano de desenvolvimento profissional. Nosso plano de carreira é dividido em 4 pilares:
Carreira técnica: Você pode seguir a trilha de crescimento técnico, se o seu objetivo for se desenvolver cada vez mais em diferentes tecnologias. Oferecemos diversos treinamentos!
Carreira de Liderança: Você pode seguir a trilha e se tornar um líder, desenvolver pessoas, auxiliar na evolução profissional e pessoal e estimular o crescimento para o surgimento de novos talentos.
Experiência internacional: Estamos crescendo cada vez mais fora do Brasil e você tem possibilidade de atuar em projetos para outros países, ou diretamente nos países onde a BRQ tem sede.
Empreendedorismo: De funcionário para sócio! Temos o Innovation Hub, a Corporate Venture que investe em ideias de profissionais que tenham sinergia com nosso negócio.
- E os benefícios?
Plano de Saúde; Plano Odontológico; Seguro de Vida; Vale Refeição; Vale Alimentação; Horário Flexível; Home Office; Gympass, Telemedicina, Telenutrição, Canal de suporte emocional 24h e muito mais!
- Como é trabalhar na BRQ?
Temos um clima descontraído, diversos programas e eventos internos. Adoramos comemorar! E fazemos isso muito bem! Veja aqui no Youtube: youtube.com/brqdigitalsolutions
Curtiu? Então inscreva-se e venha para o melhor da Transformação Digital com a gente!

title: Retention Specialist
description:
About Hearth
Hearth is a Fintech company helping home improvement contractors grow and manage their business. Our SaaS platform provides over 14,000 contractors the financial tools they need to close more business, including financing solutions, invoicing, payment collections, insurance products, all in one, modern system designed specifically for the home improvement industry.
Backed by 8VC, Founders Fund, and other prominent leaders in Silicon Valley, Hearth has raised over $50M and is one of the fastest growing companies in the home improvement space.
The Mission
To us, the home improvement contractor is a true embodiment of the American Dream – skilled craftspeople who choose to start their own business to build a better life for their families and their communities.
While home improvement professionals power a $500 billion per year industry and protect the homes of millions of Americans, they are typically overlooked by Wall Street and Silicon Valley, and are one of the most underserved, undercapitalized, and written-off segments of entrepreneurs.
We built Hearth to tip the odds of success in their favor. Hearth is a seamless digital toolkit that helps home improvement pros win more projects, grow their sales, and save time running their business. In the last six years, we’ve built an industry-leading technology platform (Financing, Payments, Quotes, Contracts, and Banking), work with over 15,000 contractors, and have funded over $500 million in additional projects for home improvement pros. And, we are just getting started.
The Opportunity:
As a Retention Specialist at Hearth, you will play a critical role in our Customer Success team, focusing on managing inbound cancellations, running retention initiatives, and driving revenue growth. Your mission is to deeply understand our customers' needs, address their concerns, and use all available resources to retain their business. This role is ideal for someone who is motivated by results, resilient in challenging situations, and passionate about helping businesses succeed.
Why This Opportunity is Exciting:
The ideal candidate for this role is someone who is eager to leverage their unique skills to significantly impact the customer experience while developing their career and expanding their influence within the company. This opportunity is not just a job—it's a chance to use your strengths to transform customer retention and influence the overall direction of how we assist our customers. You will have the ability to shape the top of the funnel through detailed data collection and reporting, becoming a pivotal member of the company. Your efforts will be recognized as key to driving rapid company growth, and you’ll be compensated based on your results, similar to a sales rep. This is a role where your contributions truly matter.
What We're Looking For:
We’re searching for someone who’s got a natural knack for sales—you know how to ask the right questions, dig deep, and truly understand what’s bothering our customers. You’re the type of person who doesn’t just stop at the surface but uses every tool at your disposal to find solutions that work. Cold calls? Tough conversations? They don’t scare you. In fact, you thrive in those moments, staying cool and collected no matter how challenging things get.
Curiosity is in your DNA. You’re genuinely interested in our customers and passionate about helping them succeed. When the going gets tough, you don’t shy away; instead, you roll up your sleeves and get the job done, no matter what it takes. Doing the right thing is important to you—even if it’s not the easiest or most popular choice.
You’re hungry for results and not just here to clock in and out. You’re driven to make a real impact, and you see your performance as the key to controlling your own income. And let’s be honest—you’re ambitious. You’re always looking for ways to grow, improve, and move up in your career.
What you’ll do: :
Customer Engagement:
Proactively reach out to customers who have requested cancellations or expressed dissatisfaction. Listen to their concerns, identify pain points, and offer personalized solutions to retain their business.
Issue Resolution:
Address and resolve customer issues in a timely and effective manner. Collaborate with internal teams to ensure that all customer concerns are fully resolved and documented.
Retention Strategies:
Develop and implement tailored retention strategies for different customer segments, utilizing data and customer feedback to continuously improve these approaches.
Renewal Assistance:
Assist customers with the renewal process, ensuring they fully understand the value of our services and the benefits of continuing their relationship with us.
Reporting & Analytics:
Track and report on retention metrics, customer feedback, and the effectiveness of retention strategies. Provide insights and recommendations to the Retention Manager.
Product Knowledge:
Stay up-to-date on all product features, updates, and industry trends to effectively communicate the value proposition to customers.
Collaboration:
Work closely with the Sales, Product, and Customer Success teams to share insights and ensure a cohesive approach to customer retention.
Upsell & Cross-Sell:
Identify upsell and cross-sell opportunities that align with customer needs, contributing to revenue growth.
Qualifications:
2+ years of experience in customer service, sales, or a related field.
Strong foundation in customer-facing roles with excellent communication and active listening skills.
Proven track record of meeting or exceeding quotas/KPIs.
Experience with Salesforce or similar CRM systems.
Ability to handle high-volume, fast-paced phone interactions with resilience.
Problem-solving and conflict resolution skills.
Adaptability to a fast-changing environment with attention to detail and consistent follow-through.
Customer-centric mindset with a genuine desire to help businesses succeed.
Preferred:
Experience in the Home Improvement/Construction vertical or adjacent fields
Our Core Values
Truth.
We value honesty and data. We seek to understand what is reality, so we can effectively respond to it.
Slope.
Rate of change over time. We hire and reward based on a team member’s potential, capacity, and growth-mindset, rather than a fancy resume.
Mutual Benefit.
The best outcomes happen when everyone wins - customers, team members, and the company. We seek to understand each other’s aspirations and create alignment to get there.
Competitive Greatness.
We desire an opportunity and environment from which to pull the greatest versions of ourselves out into the world, rather than just a “job”.
At Hearth, we value resilience, curiosity, and a strong drive for results. We recognize that retention can be challenging, but we believe in the power of addressing each customer's unique needs. If you're excited about making a real difference in how businesses operate and grow, we want to hear from you!

title: Migraine Specialist (Paid Consultancy Opportunity)
description:
Company

- We are recruiting for
healthcare professionals that manage migraine patients
for a paid consultancy session on an online research study.

patient journey and treatment pathway, with particular focus on those receiving preventive treatments , and explores treatment decisions and real-world case reviews.

-

title: Especialista em RevOps
description:
Olá, somos a SuperFrete :)
Queremos ser a maior e mais amada rede de logística digital, quer fazer parte disso?
Somos uma startup que atua no segmento do varejo e logística, apoiando os pequenos e médios empreendedores a se tornarem mais competitivos no mercado e a alavancarem suas vendas. Por isso, buscamos um(a)
Super Especialista em RevOps , que se identifique com o nosso propósito, que tenha muita energia, para somar no time e que queira crescer (muito!) com a gente.
Responsabilidades:
Gerenciar, configurar e otimizar a plataforma HubSpot para melhorar o marketing, vendas e atendimento ao cliente entre a SuperFrete e seus clientes. Por isso, você será responsável por criar e implementar estratégias avançadas de personalização, segmentação e automação alinhado à estratégia de comunicação. Seu papel envolve não apenas a gestão e análise de dados, mas também a inovação constante das abordagens de CRM, influenciando diretamente os resultados da empresa. Além disso, você terá a responsabilidade de colaborar com outras áreas e liderar projetos, sempre visando otimizar a experiência do cliente e gerar valor contínuo para o negócio.
No dia a dia, você vai:
HubSpot: Gerenciar e otimizar ferramentas de CRM e automação de marketing na HubSpot, garantindo que sejam utilizadas ao máximo de seu potencial; Avaliar e implementar novas tecnologias que possam melhorar as campanhas de CRM e o uso dos dados; Implementar medidas de segurança e compliance dentro da HubSpot; Integrar a HubSpot com outras ferramentas conversacionais; Acompanhar atualizações e lançamentos na HubSpot para implementar e otimizar estratégias.
Arquitetura de sistemas e integrações: Garantir que a plataforma de CRM seja integrada com outros sistemas da SuperFrete para otimização de processos.
Personalização e dados: Criar e configurar workflows automatizados e pipelines; Criar relatórios customizados; Personalizar objetos, campos e dashboards; Gerenciar a organização dos dados na HubSpot; Implementar estratégias de lead scoring; Analisar comportamentos e padrões de compra dos clientes, segmentando a base de acordo com características comportamentais e demográficas.
Estratégias de CRM: Criar e implementar estratégias avançadas de relacionamento com o cliente, focadas em personalização, segmentação e otimização da experiência do cliente; Gerar e nutrir novos leads; Desenvolver e monitorar programas de fidelização e retenção de clientes, utilizando dados para ajustar as estratégias conforme o comportamento do público; Criar jornadas do cliente baseadas em dados, visando aumentar a lealdade, reduzir churn e aumentar o lifetime value.
Dados e relatórios: Analisar dados de jornada do cliente na HubSpot e Power BI; Criar dashboards e relatórios detalhados na HubSpot; Monitorar continuamente o desempenho das ações e operação de todas as frentes dentro da HubSpot, propor melhorias nas estratégias, com base em análises, feedback dos clientes e tendências de mercado, para aumentar a eficácia da experiência do cliente.
Suporte às outras equipes: Colaborar com as equipes de Marketing, Vendas, Produto e Atendimento ao cliente para garantir a consistência das estratégias e alinhamento de objetivos; Participar de reuniões estratégicas com a liderança para compartilhar insights, alinhar objetivos e propor soluções baseadas em dados; Fornecer suporte a outras áreas no que diz respeito à coleta e análise de dados de clientes para otimização de processos; Criar estratégias de ativação, engajamento e retenção; Monitorar o comportamento dos usuários dentro do produto; Documentar todas as iniciativas implementadas entre as outras áreas.
Inovação: Acompanhar tendências e inovações no mercado de CRM, propondo novas soluções e abordagens para melhorar os processos da empresa; Testar novas funcionalidades e estratégias (ex.: inteligência artificial, machine learning, gamificação) para aprimorar a experiência do cliente e aumentar a eficácia das campanhas.
Governança: Garantir a governança dos dados, mantendo a integridade e qualidade das informações no CRM (Plataforma).
Requisitos:
Habilidades técnicas
Domínio da HubSpot: Experiência avançada com a HubSpot; Experiência em configurar e integrar plataformas de CRM com outras ferramentas de dados e marketing, assegurando a centralização e qualidade dos dados. Habilidade para fazer análises de jornada dos usuários na HubSpot, para identificar problemas de fluxos, pipelines e bugs; Habilidade para trabalhar com dados de clientes, coletando, organizando a arquitetura de dados.
Automações HubSpot: Experiência avançada para criar automações para disparos de comunicação; Habilidade para criação de fluxos de pipelines; Criação de fluxos para alimentar/atualizar propriedades e outros; Habilidade com lógica para criação de automação de fluxos de comunicação.
Segmentação e personalização na HubSpot: Conhecimento avançado de variáveis e lógicas de ferramentas para segmentar base de usuários; Experiência na criação de objetos personalizados; Experiência em criação de propriedades para segmentação de base; Capacidade de criar campanhas mais segmentadas e personalizadas, entendendo melhor o comportamento dos clientes e adaptando as comunicações a diferentes públicos.
Análise avançada de jornada do cliente: Habilidade para compreender as necessidades e expectativas dos clientes; Entendimento da jornada do cliente e uso de dados para identificar pontos de contato e otimizar o ciclo de vida do cliente.
Comunicação e gestão de projetos: Capacidade de projetar e executar processos repetíveis e eficientes em grande escala; Habilidade de trabalhar em conjunto com equipes de vendas, marketing e suporte ao cliente; Boa comunicação para entender as necessidades de usuários internos e propor soluções adequadas.
Habilidades comportamentais
Curiosidade: Capacidade de antecipar problemas, sugerir melhorias e agir antes que as oportunidades sejam perdidas.
Pensamento crítico: Ser capaz de analisar cenários para identificar problemas rapidamente, avaliar opções e sugerir soluções.
Orientação a resultados: Foco constante em alcançar metas e KPIs definidos.
Capacidade analítica: Habilidade de interpretar dados e transformar insights em ações concretas.
Atenção aos detalhes: Cuidado meticuloso com a operação de CRM.
Comunicação, negociação e priorização: Ser claro e objetivo ao comunicar insights, resultados e estratégias, tanto para a equipe interna quanto para stakeholders.
O que você pode esperar dos Supers?
Uma cultura de muita confiança, colaboração, focada em resultados, com muita autonomia e transparência;
Buscamos excelência em tudo o que fazemos, por isso estamos sempre aprendendo;
Temos vontade de construir junto, fazer a diferença e gerar impacto.
O que oferecemos:
Modelo de contratação: PJ;
‍‍ Modelo de trabalho 100% remoto: uma oportunidade de crescimento acessível para talentos em todo o Brasil;
Plano de Saúde: mantenha-se saudável com nosso abrangente plano de saúde nacional com consultas online e presenciais;
‍‍ GymPass/Wellhub: bem-estar completo para você cuidar da sua saúde física e mental com os aplicativos integrados;
Voucher Kit Escritório: receba um voucher para turbinar o seu espaço de trabalho e garantir seu conforto, comodidade e produtividade;
Férias remuneradas: desfrute de 30 dias de férias remuneradas por ano para recarregar suas energias e relaxar;
Programa Super-Get-Super: indique um talento e receba um bônus;
Cultura colaborativa: nossa cultura é baseada na confiança, parceria e foco em resultados. Oferecemos um ambiente com autonomia e transparência;
Incentivo ao desenvolvimento: estamos comprometidos com a excelência e o aprendizado contínuo. Oferecemos avaliações semestrais, conversas de one-on-one, feedbacks construtivos, e muito mais;
Programa de Stock Option: possibilidade de se tornar sócio da empresa que foi reconhecida como uma das Startups mais promissoras do Brasil na lista 100 Startups to Watch. Se você está determinado a avançar em sua carreira, este é o lugar certo para você!
E aí, vamos juntos nesse SuperFoguete?

title: Supply Chain Analyst - Remote
description:
Recognized as the leading software development company in the Americas, our client offers 100% remote modality and an excellent work environment where employees can thrive, and work in multicultural teams, with flexible schedules and endless growth opportunities.
About the Role:
We are looking for a Supply Chain Analyst to join our team and help drive our growth. As a Supply Chain Analyst, you will play a critical and active role in the day-to-day operations. This is an excellent opportunity to be one of the key members of our team and position yourself for unique career growth opportunities.
What You’ll Do:
- Determine supply needs for products and services and research potential suppliers.

  • Act as a link and communicate pricing and performance needs to vendors and suppliers.
  • Participate in negotiations of favorable procurement contracts and prices with selected vendors and suppliers.
  • Select the most suitable suppliers in terms of reliability, product quality, and cost-efficiency.
  • Maintain and update a list of suppliers and their qualifications, delivery times, and potential future development.
  • Prepare cost-benefit analysis reports for review by managers.
    Here’s what we are looking for:
    - 2+ years experience in a supply management role or related position.
  • Knowledge of SAP or SAP B1.
  • Degree in supply chain management, logistics, business management, or related fields.
  • Experience in managing inventory.
  • SQL analysis tools and mathematical analysis.
  • Interpersonal skills and ability to build and improve trust.
  • Advanced English level.
    Benefits:
    - 100% remote work.
  • Flexible hours - make your own schedule!
  • Diverse and multicultural work environment.
  • Paid parental leave, vacation & holidays.
  • Hardware setup for you to work from home.
  • Excellent compensation — well above the market average.
  • Extensive opportunities for growth and professional development thanks to our mentoring system.
    Enjoy the opportunity to have a dynamic lifestyle, better health, and wellness. Find renewed passion in your job, improve your productivity, and benefit from attractive growth opportunities for your career.
    If you are interested in being part of a team composed of the best professionals and working 100% goal-oriented in an innovative environment, but with the structure and resources of a multinational market leader, do not hesitate to apply!

title: Assistente de TI
description:

title: Analista de Seguros
description:
Sobre a Lockton
Fundada há mais de 50 anos por Jack Lockton em Kansas City, a Lockton desenvolveu uma marca internacionalmente reconhecida pela qualidade e eficiência nos serviços que oferecemos. Graças a lealdade de nossos clientes, que nos permitiu crescer expressivamente nos últimos anos, a Lockton hoje está entre as maiores corretoras de seguro do mundo, conquistando a taxa de crescimento orgânico mais rápida do mercado de corretoras
Responsabilidades e Atribuições:
Monitorar os prazos de renovação das apólices, garantir que todas as informações estejam atualizadas e corretas, tanto nos sistemas internos da Lockton quanto nas bases dos clientes.
Realizar verificações periódicas para evitar atrasos ou inconsistências que possam impactar o processo.
Inserir informações detalhadas e precisas sobre apólices, renovações, condições contratuais e observações importantes nos sistemas, assegurando a confiabilidade e integridade dos dados para suportar as operações comerciais e técnicas.
Criar materiais visuais, relatórios e planilhas que facilitem o acompanhamento dos processos de seguros, fornecendo informações claras para clientes, gestores e equipes internas. Preparar documentos que apoiem reuniões e tomadas de decisão.
Servir de ponto de contato entre as equipes comerciais, técnicas, de emissão e outras áreas internas da Lockton, acompanhando o andamento dos processos operacionais como emissão de documentos, ajustes contratuais e esclarecimento de dúvidas, garantindo fluidez e agilidade nas entregas.
Manter o arquivo digital de documentos atualizado e organizado, controlar prazos importantes para renovações e outras etapas do processo, acompanhar fluxos de trabalho para garantir o cumprimento dos prazos e conformidade com políticas internas e regulatórias.
Requisitos e Qualificações:
Ter atuado em corretora ou seguradora.
Desejável conhecimento em ramos elementares.
Inglês avançado
Sistema de trabalho: Híbrido - 3 dias presenciais e 2 de home office.

description:

Principais Responsabilidades:
Especialista experiente em SAP DRC NFE (Conformidade de Documentos e Relatórios - Nota Fiscal Eletrônica) para liderar a implementação bem-sucedida do SAP DRC para faturamento eletrônico e conformidade tributária.
Ampla experiência nas funcionalidades do SAP DRC, integração com autoridades fiscais e gerenciamento de projetos em ambientes com alta conformidade.
Liderar a implementação completa de projetos SAP DRC NFE, incluindo coleta de requisitos, configuração, testes e implantação.
Personalizar e otimizar as soluções SAP DRC para garantir a conformidade perfeita com o faturamento eletrônico (NFE eletrônico) no Brasil ou em outras jurisdições suportadas.
Garantir a integração precisa do SAP DRC com sistemas externos, incluindo portais fiscais governamentais e sistemas legados.
Fornecer conhecimento especializado em regulamentações tributárias locais e requisitos de conformidade para faturamento eletrônico.
Colaborar com equipes multifuncionais para garantir a entrega pontual do projeto e o mínimo de interrupção dos negócios.
Identificar riscos e desenvolver proativamente estratégias de mitigação durante o ciclo de vida do projeto.
Realizar treinamentos para usuários, dar suporte à resolução de problemas e fornecer assistência para a implementação.
Manter documentação de processos, configurações e alterações de projetos.

title: Head of Engineering
description:
CTO/Head of Engineering (Remote)
Are you someone who wants to empower and inspire others? Do you find yourself looking for opportunities for continuous learning and improvement? Are you driven by the satisfaction of completing tasks and achieving goals?
Are you seeking a mission-driven culture that fosters your professional growth? If so, we would love to connect with you!
Who We Are:
We are a remote team that improves online medical education and teaches healthcare professionals domestically and abroad how to save lives. We also take the same advanced life-saving training we developed for medical professionals and give it to underserved populations all around the world at no cost. We work in conjunction with the Disque Foundation to fulfill its mission of advancing healthcare education to the underserved through advanced technology
.
Check out our
website
:
Mission
is to provide free advanced healthcare education to underserved populations in the US and around the world.
Our Goal
is to empower 10 million people by 2025.
Our Values:
Dedication to “CANI” culture:
Constant and Never-Ending Improvement mentality.
Positive Focus/Resourceful/Gritty/Perseverance:
A self-starter who isn’t held back by a lack of direction or detailed instruction.
Impeccable Ball Handling Skills:
Responsibility, Accountability, Ownership.
Unwavering Integrity:
We Always do the Right Thing.
Who we’re looking for:
We seek an executive-level technology leader who is
visionary, strategic, and passionate about innovation
- without needing to be hands-on in coding. As a
CTO/Head of Engineering
, you will guide our tech and product strategy, ensuring alignment with business goals and fostering a culture of growth and servant leadership. This is a
hybrid role
combining strategic leadership with hands-on involvement. Approximately 25–30% of the time will be dedicated to implementation and debugging, while the remaining focus will be on system architecture, technical direction, and guiding internal teams.
Work directly with external vendors and partners to align on expectations and drive outcomes—this role does not involve formal vendor management but requires effective collaboration to ensure delivery meets our standards.
Why this role is unique:
We are
transitioning from in-house backend development to a third-party tech provider
to enhance scalability, security, and performance while reducing bugs and maintenance overhead. This is a
strategic shift
that allows us to focus on front-end improvements, marketing experiments, and product innovation. We need a leader excited about this transformation - someone who can refine product strategy, guide teams, and drive innovation rather than push for in-house backend development.
As a CTO/Head of Engineering, you will be responsible for:
Technology & Product Strategy
– Define and execute a long-term technology roadmap aligned with business goals and innovation.
Leadership & Growth
– Inspire, mentor, and empower teams to drive effective execution.
Product Ownership & Execution
– Oversee product evolution, ensuring front-end and API development supports user experience, marketing agility, and growth initiatives.
Security & Scalability
– Ensure site security, performance, and scalability by working with our third-party technology partner while keeping internal processes efficient.
Technical Escalation & Support
– Provide backup for critical issues and guide troubleshooting, ensuring smooth collaboration with third-party providers.
Cross-Functional Collaboration
– Collaborate with marketing, sales, and operations to leverage technology for business impact.
Vendor & Partner Management
– Manage relationships with external tech providers to maximize efficiency, reliability, and innovation.
You’ll thrive in this role if you are:
A visionary and servant leader who inspires teams and drives strategy.
Product-driven with business acumen, focusing on strategic impact rather than just technical execution.
Excited about transitioning to a third-party provider, focusing on innovation, scalability, and growth.
Technical but not hands-on daily, guiding decisions without coding every day.
Adaptable, proactive, and resourceful in navigating complex challenges.
A tech enthusiast passionate about AI and emerging technologies.
A strong communicator who can explain complex concepts to non-experts.
Remote-ready and thrive in a flexible, independent work environment.
Must-Have Experience
Leadership experience in a technology or product-focused executive role
Experience with Client side web development (HTML/CSS/JS/Smarty/Smarty Twig)
Deep understanding of front-end and API-driven development (modern JavaScript frameworks (e.g., React, AngularJS), CSS frameworks (e.g., Bootstrap, Foundation, UI Kit), component-based architecture, GraphQL)
Understanding of AWS, CDN, MariaDB, Apache HTTPd web servers, Linux, Cloud computing, CI/CD, cybersecurity
Experience working with Platform as a Service (PaaS) and API-driven environments
Security and scalability expertise in a digital product environment
Proven ability to lead cross-functional teams and manage external technology vendors
Experience collaborating with external vendors to drive outcomes without direct management responsibility.
Nice to Have (or willingness to learn)
Cloudflare (maintenance, security, performance optimization)
WordPress, PHP, MySQL
GTM, on-site data tracking, SEO
Experience with automation tools, AI-driven tech, and experimentation platforms (e.g., VWO)
UX/UI familiarity (Figma, Adobe XD)
What This Role is NOT
A hands-on backend developer role.
A position for someone looking to rebuild everything in-house.
A rigid environment - our culture values adaptability, collaboration, and strategic thinking.
Additional Information:
This role is full-time, requiring 35-40 hours per week.
It is a fully remote contract position, with Independent Contractors responsible for their taxes and benefits.
Each applicant is required to successfully complete a paid Trial Period before transitioning to this role.
If you don’t meet 100% of the above qualifications but believe you will be a great fit, you should still seriously consider applying.
Ready to apply?
If you share our values and enthusiasm for empowering the world, please send a resume and a short cover letter with a brief description of where you see yourself adding value to the team to
.
Please address your cover letter to Helen.
SaveaLife.com does not discriminate based on sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or economic background. Further, we strongly encourage individuals from traditionally underrepresented identities to apply, including identities not explicitly named above. If there are any considerations or qualifications not acknowledged in our job description that you feel are important and relevant to this position, we encourage you to bring them to light in your application.
company: Save a Life Certifications by NHCPS

title: Sales Manager
description:
Job Description
We’re looking for a
Sales Manager
to join our team in Rio de Janeiro and help shape the future of contextual advertising as we continue to expand globally.
Who We Are
At Seedtag, we lead the way in contextual advertising with our machine learning-powered platform. Our technology provides superior brand safety, human-like content understanding, and advanced cookieless targeting, making ads more engaging and respectful. Founded by two ex-Googlers in 2014, we’ve grown to over 600 Seedtaggers across 18 countries, raising €250M to revolutionize digital advertising.
Your Challenge
Represent Seedtag to build relationships and partnerships with agencies and direct customers for local campaigns.
Educating customers (advertisers & agencies) on product features and the benefits of Seedtag so they can apply our solutions to the challenges their customers face.
Generate excitement about our digital advertising platform and increase our product sales through original solutions and proactive pitches to clients.
Develop a deep understanding of the agencies you are responsible for across all clients, verticals and internal agency teams - programmatic, planning, trading and buying.
Identify new business opportunities and new ways of working to achieve preferred partnership status within your agencies.
Achieve and overachieve your quarterly sales goals as set by your manager.
Accurately forecast and report your monthly sales/close sales commercial pipeline.
What You’ll Need to Succeed
Have graduated with a degree or equivalent educational experience.
Have at least 2 years of relevant experience in sales within the advertising industry.
Have established connections within the market, among large hubs and also media agencies.
Can demonstrate a good level of knowledge of the advertising media industry.
Have strong communication skills and are not afraid to take risks.
Are eager and curious to keep learning and have a growth mindset.
Want to join a team and is also able to work independently and autonomously.
Why Join Seedtag?
Growth & Opportunity: A key moment to join with vast career development prospects.
Flexibility: At Seedtag, we work in a hybrid model.
Learning & Development: Online ODILO courses and optional English or Spanish group classes.
Inclusive Culture: We foster a supportive environment that values personal growth.
Fun & Connection: Participate in team activities, company offsites, and more!
Additional Perks
Gympass: Access to wellness apps with certified psychologists, nutritional plans, on-demand classes, and more.
Transportation voucher (8 tickets per month, SPTrans).
Life, health, and dental insurance plans.
Restaurant vouchers.
Ready to join the Seedtag adventure?
Send us your CV and let’s grow together!
At Seedtag, we’re committed to creating an inclusive environment where everyone can thrive. We welcome diverse perspectives as they fuel our innovation and growth. Please let us know if you require accommodations during the hiring process and we’ll ensure a positive and accessible experience.

title: SAP SuccesssFactors Consultant (REMOTE)
description:
ITTConnect is seeking an
SAP SuccessFactors Consultants
to work for one of our US-based clients.
This is a role with a global leader in consulting, digital transformation, technology and engineering services present in nearly 50 countries.
Multiple positions, experts in:
SucessFactors Administration
Employee Central and Reporting (EC)
Recruitment Management (RCM)
Compensation
Onboarding (ONB)
Workzone / Fiori /SAPUI5
Job location : Remote, work anywhere from Brazil.
This job requires excellent English, written and spoken. Please submit a resume in English and be prepared for English language interviews throughout the process.
Responsibilities:
​ Responsible for the delivery of functional and technical components SAP SuccessFactors modules
Document functional and/or technical requirements as an input to application design to gather and challenge business requirement and drive workshops
Write and present the detailed functional specifications to gather and challenge business requirement and drive workshops
Translate business requirements into solution design aligning to a global template and in compliance with SuccessFactors leading practices
Configure system in accordance with Solution Design & Configuration Workbook / Business Blueprint
Validate development during qualification tests
Prepare and execute test cases, test plans, test scripts
Support the development team during technical design, development phase and UAT Tests
Design / build / test connections to SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) for Budget Utilization Management tracking
Build reports and/or dashboards using native SF reporting functionalities
Manage incidents, analyze defects, research solutions, and liaise with other support groups / stakeholders for the successful conclusion of incidents
Requirements:
15+ years of IT experience
5+ years of SAP SuccessFactors experience
Fluent in English
Experience in supporting multi-country global rollouts
At least 2 SuccessFactors end-end implementation and support experience
Certification in SAP SuccessFactors is a plus

title: Desenvolvedor Back end Sr
description:
Desenvolvedor Back-End Sênior
O que esperamos de você:
Buscamos um(a) desenvolvedor(a) back-end sênior com experiência sólida em desenvolvimento web, responsável por construir e manter a lógica e infraestrutura do lado do servidor das aplicações. Essa pessoa terá um papel fundamental na entrega de soluções escaláveis, seguras e de alta performance.

Domínio de práticas modernas de desenvolvimento: testes automatizados, integração e entrega contínua (CI/CD), refatoração de código, programação em par (pair programming) e code review.
Conhecimento em princípios de design de software, como
DRY
e
SOLID .
Familiaridade com tecnologias e serviços em nuvem, especialmente
AWS .
Experiência com automação de processos de build e release.
Vivência em metodologias ágeis, como
Scrum, Kanban e XP (Extreme Programming) .
Participação ativa em comunidades de tecnologia é um diferencial valorizado.
Competências comportamentais que valorizamos:
Facilidade de aprendizado e colaboração em equipe.
Proatividade e foco em resultados.
Boa comunicação e capacidade de compartilhar conhecimento.

title: Sr Manager Sales Professional
description:
Important: Please apply with your CV in English.
DXC only operates under CLT contracts.
Project Description
At DXC we use the power of technology to deliver mission-critical IT services that our customers need to modernize operations and drive innovation across their entire IT estate. We provide services across the Enterprise Technology Stack for business process outsourcing, analytics and engineering, applications, security, cloud, IT outsourcing and modern workplace.

  • Develop and execute sales strategies to meet revenue targets while accommodating varied sales cycle demands.
  • Lead and mentor a team of sales professionals, providing guidance and support in complex sales situations.

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure departmental alignment and mutual support.
  • Innovate within the sales process by introducing process improvements and new technologies.
  • Handle complex sales negotiations and participate in deal closings.

  • Typically, 8+ years of relevant work experience in industry, with a minimum of 3+ years in a similar role

title: Analista Junior de Testes
description:
Como será seu a dia a dia:
Contribuir com as evoluções na forma de trabalho, buscando abrdagens modernas para garantir a qualidade de nossos produtos buscando evolução constante;
Atuar na execução de testes manuais e automatizados, validações junto aos clientes para os módulos e serviços que compõem o ecossistema da nossa solução. Estar sempre atento aos desafios da função e problemas de execução e performance em geral. E buscando assegurar a continuidade das operações e a melhor experiência para o usuário;
Analisar os resultados dos testes manuais e automatizados;
Relatar bugs e melhorias para as equipes de desenvolvimento;
Trabalhar com equipes multidisciplinares para garantir a qualidade dos nossos produtos durante todo o ciclo de vida do desenvolvimento de software;
Desenvolver planos de testes, casos de testes funcionais/não funcionais e executar testes manuais e automatizados;
Atuar desde as fases iniciais de levantamento de requisitos, ajudando a descrever os critérios de aceite e acompanhar os testes de aceitação/homologação junto ao cliente;
Possuir capacidade de priorizar o seu próprio trabalho a partir das linhas gerais definidas pelo time e de feedbacks recebidos dos principais stakeholders.
O que esperamos de você:
Graduação completa na área de tecnologia
Inglês intermediário para compreensão e leitura
Bons conhecimentos e certa experiência comprovada como testador de software, engenheiro de testes de software ou função semelhante;
Conhecimentos em alguma das seguintes ferramentas: Selenium Webdriver, SoapUI/Postman, JUnit/NUnit, JMeter;
Conhecimentos na técnica de desenvolvimento ágil BDD (Behavior Driven Development).
A posição é remota, poré, caso resida na cidade de São Paulo e estiver há 24km do escritório da Unisys (Ponte João Dias), será presencial 3 vezes na semana.

title: PHP Developer
description:

Senior Software Engineer
with strong PHP and
TYPO3
expertise, a passion for frontend development, and a good command of English to work 100% remotely.

Very good knowledge of PHP and relational databases (MySQL);

Come be Magenta!

title: Software Engineer Specialist
description:
This is an exciting opportunity to join Magalu Cloud as a Software Engineer focused on Software Defined Storage (SDS). We are building an organization that will be at the center of excellence for distributed technologies, and we are building it in Brasil! With Open Source at the heart of our solutions, we are tackling some of the greatest challenges in cloud computing and we’d like you to be part of it.
This is a key role in our SDS team, responsible for storage solutions offered by our platforms to our end users. A perfect candidate will never be content with today’s solution and would always look at how to improve the product and move the bar higher.
Responsibilities
Design and develop distributed SDS solutions
Lead and mentor junior engineers in the team
Collaborate with other teams to continuously improve product’s performance
Actively participate in upstream communities for the benefit of our organization and community itself
Provide bugfixes and improvements in the software, by working with other teams in the organization and wider Open Source community
Provide guidance and knowledge transfer to teams operating SDS product
Work with junior team members when building documentation for the product
Requirements
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Computer/Electrical Engineering or related field, or proven equivalent professional experience. Experience must be in software development and/or distributed software maintenance
Experience as a software engineer
Experience working on Ceph based solutions
Understanding of various storage offerings; block, object, filesystem
Familiarity with OpenStack, Incus or LXD
Familiarity with Linux storage layer (VFS, block layer, device mapper)
Experience with Linux development, including debugging in the kernel and userspace
Experience in any two of these programing languages: C/C++, Python, Golang, Rust
Good written and verbal communication skills in Portuguese and English languages
Ability to work within the team, but also individually on dedicated tasks
How to stand out
Upstream patches in Ceph, Linux, OpenStack, Incus or LXD
Experience in building storage solutions for end users
Please remember to attach your CV in English for this position.

title: Enfermeiro Assessor Técnico
description:
Pioneira em soluções médicas fiáveis para melhorar as vidas que tocamos: a Convatec é uma empresa global de produtos e tecnologias médicas, focada em soluções para a gestão de condições crónicas, com posições de liderança no tratamento avançado de feridas, cuidados de ostomia, cuidados de continência e cuidados de infusão. Com cerca de 10.000 colaboradores, fornecemos os nossos produtos e serviços em quase 100 países, unidos pela promessa de solidariedade. As nossas soluções oferecem um conjunto de benefícios, desde a prevenção de infeções e proteção da pele em risco, até melhores resultados para os doentes e redução dos custos com os cuidados. A receita da Convatec em 2023 foi superior a 2 mil milhões de dólares. A empresa faz parte do Índice FTSE 100 (LSE:CTEC). Para saber mais sobre a Convatec, visite
Convatec
.
Sobre a Posição
: Ser um parceiro estratégico do negócio com foco na implementação de ações para difusão de conceitos e implementação das ações estratégicas alinhadas com marketing e time clínico. Treinar e comunicar sobre os conceitos, atributos e benefícios das soluções do portfólio da ConvaTec, tanto para clientes internos quanto externos. Atua alinhado com a gestão da área e do negócio em múltiplos projetos científicos e técnicos locais, apoiando os objetivos e entregas, bem como direcionando suas atividades para atender às necessidades da organização.
Responsabilidades
:
Desenvolver os materiais educativos e aulas a serem utilizados nos diferentes eventos de Educação;
Avaliar e projetar em conjunto com a área clínica, marketing e vendas as necessidades de treinamento da equipe de vendas;
Prestar consultoria aos clientes (médicos, enfermeiros,...,etc.) da área ou de acordo com as necessidades do negócio;
Apoiar o desenvolvimento de casos clínicos, health economics e projetos de educação técnica com impacto no negócio;
Revisar, analisar e comunicar atualizações científicas baseadas em evidências para a equipe de vendas;
Identificar a necessidade de novos conceitos técnicos, a serem desenvolvidos e comunicados à equipa de vendas e profissionais de saúde;
Implementar o plano estratégico incluindo ações de educação de acordo com o planejamento de eventos, congressos e outros em nível técnico;
Revisar e trabalhar em conjunto com assuntos regulatórios e liderança de área no desenvolvimento de materiais locais de educação e treinamento;
Responsável pela aplicação de treinamentos técnicos junto aos clientes da área.
Qualificações
:
Necessário Pós graduação em Estomaterapia ou áreas afins;
Habilidades Necessárias
:
Experiência comprovada com educação e treinamentos no segmento de medical devices;
Excelentes habilidades de comunicação verbal e escrita;
Conhecimento da indústria de saúde e dispositivos médicos;
3 a 5 anos de experiência em tratamento de feridas e ostomias;
Habilidades numéricas, analíticas e de comunicação (Excel, aplicativos de comunicação,... etc.);
Capacidade demonstrada na condução de programas educacionais;
Capacidade demonstrada de identificar necessidades e propor soluções;
Experiência em gerenciamento de grupos e apresentações públicas;
Orientação de detalhes;
Nível intermediário de inglês.

title: Business Development Representative
description:
SPOKEN ENGLISH IS A
MUST!
*Please make sure to submit your resume in English, it will not be accepted otherwise. The interview process will also be conducted in English.
Smart Age Solutions is a Digital Marketing agency located in New York with a branch in Rio de Janeiro. We are looking for new talents in Brazil to build our fast-growing team.
Here at Smart Age, we offer a wide range of results-driven services and don’t settle for less-than-optimum quality. Smart Age is the only Google Premier Partner and META preferred partner in the jewelry industry. We create precise, fully customizable strategies across Google Search, Social Media, SEO, Retargeting, Display, and Email Marketing, to maximize conversions. Our team of industry experts helps businesses succeed in an increasingly digital world by using practices and platforms that deliver results today while planning for what’s coming tomorrow.
Job Overview
We are actively looking for an
Business Development Representative
to join our team. The ideal candidate will be a strategic thinker with exceptional sales skills, a flair for digital marketing, and characteristically charismatic & convincing.
Responsibilities
Proactively lead international sales initiatives by identifying and engaging with prospective clients across diverse markets.
Develop and implement targeted digital marketing strategies, driving lead conversion and customer acquisition.
Analyze and interpret data insights and performance metrics to continuously refine sales and marketing strategies, iterating on successful approaches to maximize conversion rates and revenue growth.
Requirements
Fluent in English, with excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Charismatic and persuasive demeanor, with the ability to proactively engage potential clients, build rapport, and convincingly articulate the value proposition of our products or services.
Demonstrated track record of success in sales, with a proven ability to convert leads into clients and drive revenue growth.
Adaptability and resilience in navigating the jewelry market dynamics and overcoming challenges to meet sales targets.
Employ a charismatic and persuasive approach to nurture client relationships and effectively convert leads into loyal customers.
Experience in Digital Marketing is a plus.
Join us in shaping the future of global digital innovation! We embrace diversity and inclusion, valuing talent and passion above all else. Don't miss out on this exciting opportunity to make your mark on the world stage. Apply now and let's embark on this journey together!
Industry
Advertising Services
Employment Type
Full-time
*The hiring process will be conducted in English
You should expect to dress professionally throughout all parts of our interview process.

title: Oportunidade para Autônomos: Entregas Expressas
description:
Seja um Agregado Logus Logistica Integrada!
A Logus Logistica Integrada, com 2 anos de destaque no
mercado de transporte e logística, busca motoristas autônomos para integrar
nossa equipe em Rio de Janeiro e Petrópolis. Venha fazer parte de uma empresa
referência no setor!
Por que ser um Agregado Logus?
·
Segurança em Primeiro Lugar: Nossa prioridade é
a segurança dos motoristas, com protocolos rigorosos e treinamentos regulares.
·
Operação Eficiente:
·
Carregamento agendado e rápido, sem fila.
·
Simplicidade sem manuseio de Nota Fiscal.
·
Roteirização fácil pelo nosso aplicativo.
·
Pagamento quinzenal e incentivos extras por
produtividade.
Requisitos
Veículo com até 15 anos de uso.
·
CNPJ (pode ser MEI).
·
CNH com "exerce atividade remunerada"
(EAR).
·
Exame toxicológico (após aprovação).
Documentação Necessária
·
Foto 3x4 (fundo branco).
·
RG (frente e verso).
·
CRLV em PDF.
·
Comprovante de endereço atualizado.
·
Pontuação da CNH.
·
Fotos do veículo.
VALORES DAS ROTAS
·
Seg. à Sab: R$320,00 (Utilitário)
·
Dom. e Feriados R$480,00 (Utilitário)
·
Variável de 0,45, por KM planejado em rota
Entre em contato e faça parte da nossa história de sucesso,
garantindo entregas com pontualidade e eficiência!

title: Entregador Last Mile RJ: Ganhos Flexíveis com E-commerce
description:
Oportunidade para Motoristas Parceiros (Utilitários,VUC, Carro de
Passeio)
A SUPPLY SOLUÇÕES está
agregando VEÍCULOS UTILITÁRIOS E/OU DE PASSEIO para atuar com entrega em
diversas rotas na região de TAQUARA/ BARRA DA TIJUCA/ RECREIO DOS BANDEIRANTES/
JACAREPAGUÁ/ ZONA SUL DO RIO em uma das maiores empresas do e-commerce do
mundo.
Motoristas experientes
ou pessoas habilitadas que querem iniciar nessa atividade são bem-vindos. Se
você ainda não trabalhou com logística e entregas, não se preocupe, a SUPPLY
dará as orientações, treinamento e suporte para que você possa ingressar
conosco.
Cada motorista utiliza
o seu próprio veículo. Aceitamos:
Modelos de Veículo
Utilitário: Fiorino, Van, HR, Strada, Montana, Saveiro, Kangoo ou SIMILARES.
Veículos de Passeio
todos os modelos
SOBRE A SUPPLY SOLUÇÕES INTEGRADAS LTDA.
Fundada em 2021, e com
atuação no mercado de transporte e logística, a Supply Soluções é uma empresa
referência no setor de logística, atendendo no Rio de Janeiro, nas regiões TAQUARA/
BARRA DA TIJUCA/ RECREIO DOS BANDEIRANTES/ JACAREPAGUÁ/ ZONA SUL DO RIO. Nossa
carteira de clientes inclui grandes nomes como Amazon Logistica, demonstrando
nossa capacidade de oferecer serviços de alta qualidade e confiabilidade.
Na Supply Soluções
Integradas, a segurança de nossos motoristas é uma prioridade. Seguimos
protocolos de segurança e oferecemos treinamentos regulares para garantir que
todos os nossos agregados estejam preparados para atuar confiança e
profissionalismo.
Nossa missão é
proporcionar uma experiência excepcional aos nossos clientes, garantindo
entregas pontuais e eficientes, e buscamos motoristas autônomos para se juntar
à nossa equipe. Venha fazer parte da nossa história de sucesso!
NOSSA OPERAÇÃO
Carregamento agendado e rápido, sem fila de espera
Sem Manuseio de Nota Fiscal
Roteirzação e registo de entregas simplificada pelo Aplicativo
Próprio
Pagamento quinzenal
Incentivos extras por produtividade.
REQUISITOS
Veículo até 15 anos de uso
CNPJ (pode ser MEI)
CNH com registro de "exerce atividade remunerada" (EAR)
Desejável Registro em Transportador Autônomo de Carga (TAC)
Exame Toxicológico (após aprovação do cadastro)
Caso necessário,
daremos as orientações de como obter o MEI, EAR e TAC.
DOCUMENTAÇÃO
Foto 3x4 (fundo branco e focando o rosto)
RG - Frente e verso
CRLV do veículo em PDF
Comprovante de endereço atualizado
Pontuação da CNH (no site de Detran)
Fotos do veículo
VALORES DAS ROTAS (Opcional)
Seg. à Sab: R$320,00 (Utilitário) ; R$ 515,00 (Vans) ; R$ 222,00
(Carro de Passeio)
Dom. e Feriados R$480,00 (Utilitário) ; R$ 772,50 (Vans) ; R$ 270,00
(Carro de Passeio)
Caso o DSP prefira,
pode editar para a informação mais vantajosa, de acordo com o costume da asua
região.
Venha fazer parte da
nossa rede de motoristas parceiros, aumente sua renda e independência
entregando com eficiência e segurança.
Salário mínimo: 222 BRL
Salário máximo: 772.5 BRL
Unidade de salário: Por dia
